alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 20 at 8:42PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HEAVY, WET SNOW EXPECTED TO CONTINUE OVERSPREADING THE SOUTHEAST AND CENTRAL COLORADO MOUNTAINS, AS WELL AS THE INTERSTATE-25 CORRIDOR, THROUGH TONIGHT AND CONTINUE INTO SATURDAY... .Heavy, wet snow will spread south across the central and southeast Colorado mountains, as well as the Interstate-25 corridor, through tonight and continue into Saturday. The heavy, wet snow will have the potential to cause damage to trees and power lines. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County and Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy, wet snow could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Overnight lows tonight are expected to fall below freezing across portions of Huerfano County. Take precautions to protect tender vegetation as well as exposed irrigation systems to prevent damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
